mapper.select: SELECT i.INDIVIDUAL_INQUIRY_NO as individualNo, c.CATEGORY_NAME as "categoryName.name", u.user_name as "userName.name", i.INDIVIDUAL_INQUIRY_TITLE as individualTitle, i.INDIVIDUAL_INQUIRY_UPDATE_DATE as individualUpdateDate FROM BookHub.INDIVIDUAL_INQUIRIES i JOIN BookHub.USER u ON i.INQUIRY_USER_NO = u.user_no JOIN BookHub.CATEGORY c ON i.INQUIRY_CATEGORY_NO = c.CATEGORY_NO WHERE i.INDIVIDUAL_INQUIRY_ANSWER_YN = 0 AND i.INDIVIDUAL_INQUIRY_DELETE_YN = 0 GROUP BY c.CATEGORY_NAME;
